phoneBook.title: Phone Book
phoneBook.description: This project is a phone book developed with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP. It allows you to store, edit, and delete contacts, providing a simple and intuitive interface for contact management.

dictionary.title: Dictionary
dictionary.description: This is the Dictionary, an app that allows users to find the meaning of searched words. The project was developed with the intention of practicing my knowledge in Vue.JS and API consumption.

wordGame.title: Word Game
wordGame.description: During my JS studies, I decided to challenge myself and put the knowledge I was acquiring into practice with a game. I decided to recreate a game I really like called 'Termo' and this was the result.

orangePortfolio.title: Orange Portfolio
orangePortfolio.description: This project is a portfolio developed during a hackathon. It allows users to publish and share their projects in an interactive gallery.
